item.title: Omgnomorenames Speed Frumball
item.dc:creator: @omgnomorenames omgnomorenames
item.description:
@omgnomorenames wrote:

This Is My Second Script

[size=40pt]Please Post Any Errors or Scores So I know it is working[/size]

Known Errors:
When it gets shrink it will most likely lose a life
No actual codeing errors though

Script Info:
Runs on screen of 520 by 560, but if you erase Start from the main and start script yourself it should work on other settings. (For anyone who tries this please tell me if this works :))

Added Invisible Find Muhaha!!!

Stuff To be Added:
Choice to sendscore
Auto Restart

[code]program New;
//Run screen on 520 by 560
var
FrumBall: Integer;
Isitover: Integer;
x,y: Integer;
RandClick: Integer;

procedure LoadBmps;
begin;
FrumBall := BitmapFromString(10, 10, ‘z78DA75525B12C42008BB’ +
‘126055FCF4C5FD8FB42AB875A7DD7C300E482046801BC83E2303C’ +
‘7022FD1AA0F200787ECB07680E044DEE2456D5411F8026320BC32’ +
‘216169BF37631141E62AE2929E35EFD262B00DB9C238DD5DB58BE’ +
‘4260746425A0F83018C8130D5A9A2F8DDA553E40F265F28367DA9’ +
‘3B7B8B1799FBBD43AB67AFEE7C6A94A85B1E58995335A5EC81093’ +
‘D11EA0BD85B2D5D3AC5661D4AC7CBC4EDCBF6283A3417FE79E4A9’ +
‘CBBC99BE1EC1E36F10E6B61569A4341D54FE131FADC08736’);
end;

procedure Start;
begin
SendKeys(‘frumball’)
wait(1000)
ClickMouse(260, 357,true)
end;

procedure FindBall;
begin
if(FindBitmap(FrumBall,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y);
Isitover:=0
end else;
if (findcolor(x,y,1638267,18,23,492,410)) then
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y);
Isitover:=0
end else;
Isitover:=Isitover+1;
RandClick:=RandClick+1;
end;

//Main
begin
LoadBmps;
Start;
wait (1000)
repeat
Findball;
if RandClick > 100 then
begin
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
RandClick:=0;
end else;
until (Isitover >= 1000)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
